Stop-loss strategy: Sell when the stock price drops by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA decline consecutively for two years.
Trigger a sell order if the stock price falls by 15% or more from the current price, or if the EPS (earnings per share) turns negative.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and EPS show significant declines.
